description: Out of print in the U.S.! Though he'd been a professional musician for over two decades, Outrider was the first official solo album by former Led Zeppelin guitar legend. The album showcases Page's unique style that charmed the pants off of Zep fans for a decade. Speaking of Zep, both Robert Plant and Jason Bonham (John's son) make appearances on the album alongside Chris Farlowe, John Miles, Tony Franklin and others. Features nine tracks including 'Wasting My Time', 'The Only One' and the beautiful 'Emerald Eyes'. Universal.
title: Outrider
